statements.query: MATCH (n:AzureSQLServer)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:AzureSQLServer)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
